instructions:
Melt butter and stir in the Golden seasoning. Brush top of each fillet with seasoned butter. Turn and
brush other side and then roll from small end. Secure with toothpick. Place in a greased 6 x 10 inch Pyrex
baking dish. Bake uncovered in a 350-degree oven for 10 minutes. Strew grapes and wine over fillets and
bake an additional 10 to 15 minutes or until fish flakes easily. 
*(Rev. 4/8/94)*
ingredients: 2 envelopes G Washington Golden seasoning mix
1/2 cup white grapes, halved and seeded
name: Sole Veronique
